what: Create a container for shinylive application — create_shinylive_container
title: Create a container for shinylive application — create_shinylive_container
text: Allows embed shinylive standalone app pkgdown website. Importantly, need serve website preview applications. work classic pkgdown local browser. best way either use httpuv::runStaticServer("<SITE_PATH>") use go live VSCode extension.

title: Create a container for shinylive application — create_shinylive_container
code: create_shinylive_container(   app_path,   id,   mode = c("viewer", "editor-terminal-viewer"),   height = NULL )

title: Create a container for shinylive application — create_shinylive_container
text: id Unique container id. mode shinylive app configuration. Display either app, app + code editor + terminal. height Container height. Expect valid CSS unit like 800px. app_json_path app_path App location. call shinylive::export create JSON file forwarded shinylive. works app within directory created R function.

title: Create a container for shinylive application — create_shinylive_container
